attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I downloaded this and my phone broke and I got whiplash from all the racism and toxins this contains. I was a “trump supporter” but ion know now bout dat now😒 hate you Trump 😘😘 I’m definitely not from tik tok😌😉

attributes.title: Trash Trump😊
attributes.review: This was the worst app everrrrr I have downloaded ever since the dinosaur age🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢 It also makes me feel nauseous and dizzy, which also makes me want to throw up🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: My phone is ruined
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my Siri started making vomit noises and wouldn’t stop until my phone over heated and powered off. 💕𝑇ℎ𝑖𝑠 ✨𝑎𝑝𝑝 💫𝑠𝑢𝑐𝑘𝑠🧚

attributes.title: Ruined my LIFE
attributes.review: This app took the whole week to download, then gave my device 34 viruses! It also showed me some disgusting photos of this fleshy orange thing.

attributes.title: It kept crashing
attributes.review: Hi I love walls why don’t we build one everywhere heck let’s trap Canada also it kept crashing and have fun with this app white supremist looking ash

attributes.title: Crash
attributes.review: This app is trash! It keeps crashing my phone and I have to restart it every time! Very disappointed in President Trump

attributes.title: dump trump 2020
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support ✨Donald J. Trump✨ but instead was greeted by an orange on the loading screen. Also the fact that he wants to ban tiktok. 👁👄👁. Get this horrible app off the app store! Not tiktok! 👀

attributes.title: Biden 2020
attributes.review: I only downloaded this app because of TikTok, however, this app is super poorly run. It’s just links and videos of trump supporters speaking their mind and no facts what so ever. Biden 2020 all day.

attributes.title: Trump is dumb
attributes.review: I hate your face and you deserve nothing. You’re racist, and disgusting. I can’t believe people like a person who has such a disgusting heart.

attributes.title: No just no
attributes.review: So I got this app to see what the election for Donald trump was (I am not a part of the gen z) but it kept crashing and wouldn’t work correctly
